Texts.Eng: ...and that, my friend, is why the Hounds of Tindalos are not to be treated like a puppy. Anyhow, I rambled off again. Get yourself your five Nocxium Bars, and Unknown Reactor and a Trapezohedron and you'll have the finest lower-robe a cultist could hope for!

Texts.Chs: 关于信徒服饰的获取指南
Texts.Eng: A guide to proper cultist formal attire

Texts.Chs: 信徒真正的服饰 - 下装
